caption.title: Induction of Foxp3 and reduction in the levels of proinflammatory cytokines attenuate intestinal-tissue inflammation upon puerarin treatment of HFD-fed mice.
caption.p: The mRNA expression levels of IL-6, MCP-1, IL-10, and Foxp3 in the small intestine (A) and colon (B) of mice. Data represent mean ± SEM. According to one-way ANOVA with the Newman–Keuls post hoc test, as compared with the NC group: *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01. As compared with the HFD group: #P < 0.05, ##P < 0.01.
